scenario_text.value:
Takuma, there! That’s it! That’s the source
of the weird feeling!
Ahhh... AAAAAAH! What’s going on, y’all?
(A country accent?)
I’m just passing through, y’all! Leave me be!
(It’s not attacking? Not an enemy?)

(It might be friendly if we say the right
thing.)
Hey there!
(How can I make Tentomon understand?)
Come with us?
It’s dangerous here.
Stay back!
Come with us?
Do you wanna come with us?
What? What do y’all mean by that?

It’s just...
We’re heading to a big fight now.

We really need help, and I was hoping you
might join us...

Wait, sorry. I know you have no reason to do
a stranger any favors, but...
Fine by me.
That’s okay, I knew it was a long shot...
Wait, what?! Are you sure?

Fine by me. I was just feelin’ lonesome,
myself.

It’s hard trying to scare up food and safety
all on your own.

And the folks I’d been living here with since
forever have started bein’ disagreeable.

Gettin’ all violent and stuff.
And they get mad at the drop of a hat.

And I kinda like how y’all are straight with
me. No lies on y’all’s face!
I like y’all! I’ll go with y’all, sure!
Good job, Takuma. Honesty worked!
I guess so. Nice to meet you!

Name’s Tentomon.
Nice to meet y’all!
It’s dangerous here.

It’s dangerous to stay here.
The enemy might attack at any moment!

Enemy? What are y’all on about?
Who are y’all, anyways?
Who? I’m just a human.

And I’m supposed to trust a hew-mun who just
pops out, shoutin’ at me?
Oh...yeah. I guess I can’t blame you.
Forget y’all. I’m seeing myself out!
There he goes...

(That might have gone better if I’d used
a different approach...)
Stay back!
Um...
(Hang on! That’s a creature too?)
(It’s all alone. It can’t be an enemy...)

What are y’all shouting about?
No reason to be angry...
No! Stay back!
Y’all are rude!

I don’t like some weird hew-mun telling me to
stay back!
He left...
We were the weird ones?
I wonder...but I think I screwed up.
